name: Flipster
description:
Firefox users: for best results, fullscreen the game and ctrl + plus to zoom in. Flipster – A Flippity Fun Adventure by Team Poyá!

The lovable Flippy embarks on a great quest in this flippity fun platformer game! Dodge alligators, poison, birds, spiders, and more as you try to get to the goal! Just press the space bar to activate the flipping mechanism, and use the arrow keys to run and jump across the stage! This game was made for Curdle Game Jam #19. 

Made with love by Team Poyá:
  • Jasper Z. – programming and music
  • Tyler L. – level design
  • Peter R. – character design
  • Jake A. – additional asset design

Special thanks to Jacob G-W and John M.
